mapper.select: insert into study (no, name, content, startdate, enddate, capacity, member_no, category_no) values (#{no},#{name}, #{content}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{capacity}, #{member_no}, #{category_no})
mapper.update: update study set name=#{name}, content=#{content}, enddate=#{enddate}, capacity=#{capacity}, category_no=#{category_no} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select RECENTSTUDY.* from (select rownum as rnum, ORDEREDSTUDY.* from (select * from study S where sysdate <= S.startdate and (select count(*) from enroll where study_no=S.no and status='진행중') < S.capacity order by no desc )ORDEREDSTUDY )RECENTSTUDY where rnum between 1 and 6
